name: SSF21
title: Site-Specific Factor 21
subtitle: Response to Neoadjuvant Therapy
notes:
**Note:**  Review the medical record for a specific statement by a physician about the response to neoadjuvant therapy.  Do not try to interpret or infer a response based on other documentation in the medical record such as a description of residual tumor on the pathology report.  

Use code 999 if it is unknown if neoadjuvant therapy was given.
rows: Response noted but no mention if it was complete or partial
Not applicable:  Neoadjuvant therapy not given
Not applicable: Information not collected for this case

Unknown or no information
Not documented in patient record
